Sorry I didn't write in English, guess I was just lazy... Here's a translation for ya:

August Underground (2001), resolution 320x240
August Underground's Mordum (2003), resolution 512x384
August Underground's Penance (2007), resolution 576x320

Some of the sickest films you can see when it comes to horror movies. The first movie was only printed in 1000 copies, and is both expensive and hard to find. Viewer discretion is advised!

They're not exactly hard to get. You can buy the special edition DVD of the first August Underground movie from the Toetag official store. 

You can get the other two there, as well! You can even choose to have them autographed by the filmmaker! :)

But, thanks for the upload!
